text: Bayou La Batre ( is a city in Mobile County, Alabama, United States. It is included in the Mobile metropolitan statistical area. At the 2020 census, the population was 2,204. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bayou La Batre Chamber of Commerce * The Bayou La Batre Historical Homepage Category:Cities in Alabama Category:1786 establishments in the United States Category:18th- century establishments in Mississippi Territory
title: Bayou La Batre, Alabama
